title: Error `Circular dependencies not supported` if two beans reference each other
body:
### Describe the bug

 I expect that at first only proxy beans get injected to avoid the error `Circular dependencies not supported`

### Expected behavior

Injected Proxies avoid a `Circular dependencies` error.

### Actual behavior

Error `Circular dependencies not supported`

### How to Reproduce?

[quarkus-error-reproducer.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/7809603/quarkus-error-reproducer.zip)

` ./gradlew quarkusDev`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

5.15.12-zen1-1-zen

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.1" 2021-10-19 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 17.0.1+12) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.1+12, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

N/A

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.6.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.3.3

### Additional information

_No response_
